attributes.additional_details: I would like to raise an e petition. I am disgusted to find out a flight from the UK to Sydney in Australia costs £800+. The cost of the flight is £255 with the remainder been made from tax. If I flew from Berlin the flight drops to £500. This government is penalising UK citizens and disadvantaging them in been able to experience other cultures and societies. I am not a business man I work for a local authority. I have 2 children and would like for them to experience other countries and cultures. Please support this e petition and get this government to look again at this ridiculous tax.
